channel.title: Ranging doesnt work [PI]
channel.description:
On Dreamscape or Scratch PI, ranging doesnt work and it gives me an error in my server cmd prompt whenever someone tries to range an npc or player.
[1/11/12 6:39 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(Comba tAssistant.java:476) [1/11/12 6:39 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1406) [1/11/12 6:39 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:161) [1/11/12 6:39 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:161)

item.title: Ranging doesnt work [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It’s probably something wrong in the projectiles.

Read full topic

item.title: Ranging doesnt work [PI]
item.dc:creator: @guthix1pker guthix1pker
item.description:
@guthix1pker wrote:

error in the delay between you acting (bolt shoots out) and the hit (bolt hits target). post the bit that handles that (after the error, between “(” and “)”. the part in the combatassistant I think)

Read full topic

item.title: Ranging doesnt work [PI]
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

[quote=“I Friggin LOVE Jagex, post:4, topic:428917”]open up command promt
type this code
c:>format c:
write back the results[/quote]

http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20071229013312AAHrvvs

“What happens when I format a used hard drive?”
Answer: “when you format a hard drive it erases all information on it and arranges the hard drive according to the file system specifications basically.
so yes it will wipe out your entire hard drive, if you plan to ever use the computer then yes get an xp set up cd to do the formatting”

So no don’t listen and do that wtf…
